description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows kernel information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-38041):

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates from the official Microsoft Update catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

2. Restart your system after installing the updates to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- These updates address a kernel vulnerability that may lead to exposure of sensitive information.
- Ensure your system is on a compatible build listed above before applying the updates.
- It is recommended to backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of these updates.
